Ok this is what you will get with this release. First i noticed was very very slugish performance of windows it self particulary windowses. When i tryed to move them they were stutering like in game. Drivers vice nvidia 275.33 is incompatibile (which is latest at the time of this post). When i install it desktop composition is disabled (aero is disabled) and can not be turned on as many other features that u can normaly turn on/off thus making it impossible to play games because every game reports driver incompatibility. Audio realtek and nvidia mobo drivers are working so for time being vga drivers are only problem (donno if theres issues whit ati drivers). Redpill is working and i wish it didnt. I hope they dont make this new ribbon default in new win8 cose it sucks at least for me. I didnt installed it from dvd but from win7 on to other partition. That might be the cause of stuttering but i doubt its cause of driver incompatibility. There you have its up to to decide to try it or not.
